pr_title: [OC-1195] Set severity and date as optional for user card template

timeline.bodyText:
in utils directory , it is just test for demo or example  , to make automatic integration tests it is necessary to use test in src/test/api/karate.
Move this test :
--> Add the fields in the bundle api_test and test the result via  src/test/api/karate/businessconfig/getABusinessconfig.feature
timeline.author: freddidierRTE
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -22,4 +22,12 @@ Feature: Bundle
     When method GET
     Then status 200
     And match response.id == 'userCardExamples'
+    And match response.statesData.questionState.userCard.template == 'usercard_question'
+    And match response.statesData.questionState.userCard.severityVisible == false
+    And match response.statesData.questionState.userCard.startDateVisible == true
+    And match response.statesData.questionState.userCard.endDateVisible == true
+    And match response.statesData.incidentInProgressState.userCard.template == 'usercard_incidentInProgress'
+    And match response.statesData.incidentInProgressState.userCard.severityVisible == true
+    And match response.statesData.incidentInProgressState.userCard.startDateVisible == false
+    And match response.statesData.incidentInProgressState.userCard.endDateVisible == false

timeline.message: [OC-1195] Set severity and date as optional for user card template
[OC-1195] Set severity and date as optional for user card template
[OC-1195] Set severity and date as optional for user card template

[OC-1195] Keep state "message" in process api_test example
Permit to see cards on UI if needed after api testing

Signed-off-by: freddidierRTE <frederic-f.didier@rte-france.com>
